channel.title: Social Internet Cars Hiromi on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: the Last night
item.description: last night we went to go and see the movie signs. it was wonderful. I liked it. The first time I asw it.. it was at that crazy chimaman theatre in LA. I wish that was pronounced laa. like I live in laa.. heh. too bad. stupid cars. After the movie.. hiromi “dragged” us to a bar.. I say dragged… because we didn’t really know anyone.. but I wanted to go anyway.
